channel.title: Old RUNE - Old Runescapes Unbelievable New Emulator
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Old RUNE [/size] [size=24pt]Old Runescapes Unbelievable New Emulator[/size] [img]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h413/fretfulregrets/OldRuneLogo-PK-1.png[/img] This is my first time on this site in about 3 years so thats why my post count is so low :P . This server has also been in development for about two weeks now. So about the same time vault decided to switch.( I am an ex developer of his). [COLOR="Red"][SIZE="5"]The Old RUNE Alpha is coming out Friday, the 19th!!!! Check out the forums for more info! [/SIZE] No more info will be posted on this thread, if yo want in, you gotta use the forums. Its also just a great place to ask me questions and discuss my plans. As well as get the newest updates and details first.[/COLOR] [b][url=http://]Old RUNE Website[/url][/b] So whats going to be different about my project? Well, I am going to release it.... Something very few people in the community actually do... We have had all these failures and when these people got sick of what they where doing they just quit. No one ever saw the code, because it never came out. The base I will be using is Azure. Revision is going to be 377. Exp Rate will be 4 times(subject to change to 3) that of runescapes. Still low to keep it fun, but not so low that it becomes a drag again. I am somewhat of a perfectionist with features. Especially with skills. So when a skill is green, that means its just likes runescapes. Object removing, the whole nine yards. [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/Thieving.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/prospecting.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/mining.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/woodcutting.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/ident-1.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/herb.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/chisel-1.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/dhide.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/fletching.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/spawn.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/SSAC.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/Drops.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/cookingfish.png[/img] [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb316/pilldom/aemote.png[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lNJuQSQzOvs]Old RUNE Woodcutting and Fletching - YouTube[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mmwOlaXYUPo]Combat V2 Pre Alpha #1[/url]
-Downloaded Azure. -Did all the tuts I could find XD. This really does help me though, as it saves me time on some things, and now I know I am a little more familiar with the methods and such. -Fixed Running. -Started improving Thieving. -Got pickpocketing to 99% -Made Prospecting -Got started on Mining -Finished Mining -Realized using ArraysLists rather then Arrays would be much more efficient for sorting through the removed objects. So I switched to those. -Added Woodcutting. -If a tick that goes through removed objects has no more objects in it, it stops. This way it wont always be going through a list with nothing in it. -Redid the formula for woodcutting -Got started on fishing -Finished herb cleaning :D (put a lot of hard work in to... spent an hour just trying to find what it said when you identified it..) -Finished the actual potion making stuff. -Read this great thread about ticks and how they effect skilling. [url=http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/informative-threads/315560-runescape-clock-ticks.html]http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/informative-threads/315560-runescape-clock-ticks.html[/url] Changed the skills that I had already done accordingly. -Added chiseling in crafting. -Added dragon hide crafting. I dont really like how I did it though :( . Gonna have to go and redo it at some point but it works fine for now. -Started Fletching -Added spawns -Started Combat -Finished Fletching -Fixed some bugs that where noticed in crafting. -Kinda forgot to update this thing so Im probably missing some stuff -Finished AC Combat! -Added Npc Drops -Added Cooking -Attack emote is now based on style as well as weapon. -Added about a billion definitions it seemed like... -Added food, completely forgot about it before XD -Added 6 shops
[QUOTE][url=http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h413/fretfulregrets/OldRuneLogo-PK-1.png]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h413/fretfulregrets/OldRuneLogo-PK-1.png[/url][/QUOTE] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:25, topic:410880”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=512142.msg3721292#msg3721292 date=1313954728]

Nice job on this The ones who support rs2006 obviously didn’t play rs2007.

What?
[/quote]
RS2006 first was RS2007, but due a major bug and bad coded everything, the server was only up for a few hours.[/quote]
I thought you meant REAL runescape 2006 and 2007.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“I Roll Deep, post:20, topic:410880”][quote author=RSVault link=topic=512142.msg3721185#msg3721185 date=1313948720]

Very nice. Looking forward to testing out this.

Surely cannot have as many bugs as Vaults. Every update he makes adds another 10-20 bugs to the server. Even if it’s only adding a shop.

Say what you want, Vault has done a good work.

Thank you very much, and the name of this is super childesh.
[/quote]
Yeh lol.
Anyone can say anything, but we would see them if the would be making a remake like is yours, what would they`ve done so far till now, so no point of talking shit.[/quote]

English please?..
